decision_conditions: The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans and documents: 21015 (P) 001 REV.A (existing ground floor), 21015 (P) 002 REV.A (existing first floor), 21015 (P) 003 REV.A (existing second floor), 21015 (P) 006 REV.B (existing roof plan), 21015 (P) 007 REV.A (location plan), 21015 (P) 122 REV.B (existing side elevation), 21015 (P) 125 REV.A (existing front elevation), 21015 (P) 127 REV.A (Existing rear elevation), 21015 (P) 205_N (proposed first floor), 21015 (P) 207_P (proposed roof plan), 21015 (P) 211_R (existing and proposed ground floor), 21015 (P) 214_P (proposed ground floor), 21015 (P) 215_O (proposed second floor), 21015 (P) 231_N (proposed front and back elevations), 21015 (P) 232_M (proposed side elevation), 21015 (P) 233_N (proposed rear elevation), 21015 (P) 234_G (section BB), 21015 (P) 235_E (section CC).
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning.
description: Application for non-material amendments to planning permission 222211FUL dated 23/01/2023 for: Conversion of existing building (2 flats) into 3 self-contained flats; single-storey rear/side wraparound extension; replacement of windows on rear and side elevations; installation of one window to rear (main) roof slope; two rooflights to front roof slope and three to rear outrigger roof. Amendment seeks to rectify the incorrect drawing numbers listed on the original decision notice in condition 2
